::: Hell Beast looked at Liono with shock ::: You are an idiot if I have ever 
witnessed one. You dare not help us?

::: Megatron ::: All Maximals are fools....its a programing flaw.

::: Hell Beast ::: Come, we will deal with Liono Prime later. For now we have 
a base to defend. And Brightblade, pleae return to base, we'll need your fire 
power and battle prowess.

::: The Predacons head off the beach. :::

~~~~~~~~

:::: Gremlin, Transanulas, and Pheniox try to keep things running from within 
the ship. :::

::: Gremlin ::: By pass the power from the replicators to the shields!

::: Transanulas ::: Oh shut up Gremlin, go outside and fight!

::: Pheniox ::: All of you shut up! We need to keep the auto-guns and shields 
up.

~~~~~~~~~~

::: Set, Ra, and Ominous Prime watch as the battle unfolds below them on the 
Predacon ship. They launched the Cyberbee that hunts for Hell Beast. For now, 
they could only watch, and if the People's group broke through the defenses, 
another Cyberbee would be launched and all the bots would surly die. :::
